definitions.definition: Pertaining to the see or province of a metropolitan.
Of, or pertaining to, a metropolis or other large urban settlement .
Of or pertaining to the parent state of a colony or territory, or the home country, e.g. metropolitan France

main_definition: ( Christianity ) Pertaining to the see or province of a metropolitan. [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: Of, or pertaining to, a metropolis or other large urban settlement . [from 16th c.]
Of or pertaining to the parent state of a colony or territory, or the home country, e.g. metropolitan France
